inclusion.criterion: Able to understand and communicate in English language
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of premature ovarian insufficiency: At least two menopausal FSH levels (≥ 40 IU/L) and/or Primary or secondary amenorrhea at least for 3-6 months OR Diagnosis of low ovarian reserve defined as: AMH < _0.42 ng/ML & FSH >20 IU/L, and/or failure of prior attempts of assisted reproductive techniques due to limited ovarian response (poor responder).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Presence of at least one ovary
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Acceptable uterine anatomy (by any clinically and/or imaging acceptable methods)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Normal thyroid function as evidence by normal serum Thyroid Stimulating Hormone (TSH) levels.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Agree to report any pregnancy to the research staff immediately.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to comply with study requirements and follow up instructions.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No other causes of female infertility in the subject
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unable to understand and communicate in English language
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Has a history of, or evidence of current gynecologic malignancy within the past three years
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of adnexal masses indicating the need for further evaluation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Major mental health disorder that precludes participation in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unfit or unwilling to undergo laparoscopy; has contraindication to laparoscopic surgery and/or general anesthesia
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 16-year-old girl with Hashimoto disease, high TSH levels, and low free T4 levels. She does not smoke and is not sexually active.
